="preserve">Samuel Roger Horchow (July 3, 1928 – May 2, 2020) was an American theatre producer and businessman. He was born in Cincinnati, Ohio. In 1992, he produced his first Broadway show, "Crazy for You", for which he won the Tony Award for Best Musical. He also produced versions of "Kiss Me, Kate", "Curtains" and "Gypsy".
Horchow died in Dallas, Texas on May 2, 2020 of cancer, aged 91.
